class.name: Position2D
class.description: Generic 2D position hint for editing. It's just like a plain [Node2D], but it displays as a cross in the 2D editor at all times. You can set cross' visual size by using the gizmo in the 2D editor while the node is selected.

members.member: If set to true, marker is displayed not only in the editor but also on runtime in debug builds. If debug is enabled, this property is true by default and false otherwise.
